Quest Phases

The journey broken down into strategic phases

Phase 1: Foundation & Momentum

Sep 2025 - Oct 2025
28% Active

Establish systems, validate project ideas with micro-projects, and build public momentum

Key Goals

  • Setup GitHub Org, Project Boards, and Public Blog
  • Finalize tech stack (Next.js, Supabase, Tailwind)
  • Complete Passion-Skills Audit for all 7 domains
  • Deploy 7 functional micro-projects
  • Establish consistent weekly work rhythm
2/7 Projects 28%

Phase 2: Domain Deep Dive & Execution

Nov 2025 - Apr 2026
0% Planned

Systematically build the core 42 projects, one domain at a time, advancing skills in each area

Key Goals

  • Complete 42 projects across 7 domains
  • Demonstrate depth of skill in each domain
  • Collect and incorporate user feedback
  • Follow monthly rhythm: 2 weeks dev, 1 week testing, 1 week docs
0/42 Projects 0%

Phase 3: Hub Integration & Refinement

May 2026 - Jun 2026
0% Planned

Revisit and enhance the 7 hub applications, integrating the best projects from Phase 2 as core features

Key Goals

  • Refine 7 feature-rich hub applications
  • Integrate Phase 2 projects as core features
  • Create seamless user experience within each hub
  • Establish hubs as definitive entry points
0/7 Projects 0%

Phase 4: Ecosystem Unification

Jul 2026 - Jul 2026
0% Planned

Build the capstone platform that connects all hubs into a single, cohesive ecosystem

Key Goals

  • Unified 'Passport' Authentication across all hubs
  • Centralized Dashboard showing activity from all hubs
  • Cross-Domain Discovery features
  • Community & Social Layer
  • Public API Gateway
0/1 Projects 0%

Phase 5: Launch & Evolution

Aug 2026 - Aug 2026
Planned

Public launch, community building, and strategic planning for the future

Key Goals

  • Intensive beta testing and bug squashing
  • Finalize all documentation and tutorials
  • Coordinated public launch campaign
  • Onboard initial users and collect feedback
  • Conduct full retrospective and celebrate
